item.title: Report I-2025010010
item.description:
Report I-2025010010

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-02
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: AMERICAN AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 01/02/2025 a shipment under AWB 001-92539230 came in. Upon conducting a physical search a Mac Book Pro was found, as well as a printer, power tools, and some flammable liquid. The shipment was denied ariel no further screening was conducted.

item.title: Report X-2025010598
item.description:
Report X-2025010598

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-31
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RECIEVED A CALL FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE AND RESPONDER TO THE AREA. UPON ARIVING ON SCENE RESPONDER FOUND A PLAIN WHITE SMALL BUBBLE MAILER HAD BEEN CONTAMINATED BY ANOTHER PACKAGE SO WAS BROUGHT BACK TO PSC FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. ONCE BACK TO PSC RESPONDER OPENED THE BUBBLE MAILER TO FIND A 12 GAUGE LAUNCHER AND AERIAL SIGNAL PACK WITHIN THE BUBBLE MAILER. RESPONDER THEN NOTIFIED THE RMP ABOUT A POSSIBLE UNDECLARED AND FOLLOWED PROPER PRECEDURES OF UNDECLAREDS. RESPONDER THEN LOOKED UP THE SAFETY DATA SHEET OF THE PRODUCT FOR INSIGHT ON THE SHIPPING/HANDLING REQUIREMENTS OF THE PRODUCT.

item.title: Report X-2025010603
item.description:
Report X-2025010603

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-16
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The shipment was discovered leaking during sort operations. Outer packaging: fiberboard box. Inner contents: 3 bottles of Essence Vault (Eau De Parfum 100ml each) packed in mfg. boxes and surrounded with brown paper dunnage. 1 bottle was broken. All contents were placed in a salvage drum and held pending disposition from the shipper.
